name: The Collector (BenBonk, Zalop, Gizmote)
description:
The collector is a game about collecting dead enemies before they can join together.

Note - This game can be a bit difficult (R.I.P playtesting time), but if you need to skip a level, you can press "C". 

Controls:

-WASD to move

-E to collect bodies

-R to restart

-Escape or tab to pause

Made by BenBonk, Zalop and Gizmote in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
